name: Laser Pointer
effect: This weapon reduces difficulty by 2 before accuracy. Only one weapon may benefit from the effect of a Laser Pointer at a time.
description: Many mech-scale weapons don't come with a laser guide to tell pilots where they're aiming. The AAF has solved this issue.

synergies.detail: This weapon reduces difficulty by 2 before accuracy.

name: Scry Lock-On HUD
effect: This weapon may attack up to two different additional targets at a time. If it does so, the weapon loses any non-range pattern if it has a range and each target hit takes half damage.
description: The Scry Lock-On HUD is the pride of the AAF R&D team, capable of improving munition-per-target and missile distribution efficiency by up to 50%.

name: YAMA-Class NHP
effect:
When this weapon makes any ranged attacks, it may make an attack against all characters in a Cone X area that is adjacent to at least one space you occupy, where X is equal to half of its longest listed Range, Line, or Threat.
Your mech gains the AI tag. If another NHP would cascade, this NHP will automatically seize control of the weapon.
This NHP may only act using this weapon.
description: While mounted in a weapon, Yama-Class NHPs are perfectly capable of controlling an entire mech to target entire groups of hostile forces with a sort of accuracy that allows the weapon to deal its full damage potential to all of them. Due to its efficacy, it's restricted to the Hurricane line of licensing and restrictions that require extreme background checks by even Union standards, an oddity for the AAF. Even more odd is the NHP's loyalty to its team even when unshackled, often following orders long after a pilot has passed out from whatever stressful thing was happening. Whether it's from pity, mercy, or simple dedication, AAF licensees who manage to pass all the required checks to receive a Yama-Class NHP of their own are almost always more than satisfied with the performance they get with it.

actions.name: Yama Protocol
actions.detail: When Activated, you give control of this weapon to your NHP and this weapon may not be controlled by you, any other character, or any other AI besides this Yama-Class NHP. While this is active, this Yama-Class NHP can only take the skirmish quick action 1/turn with the weapon it is attached to, and it may only skirmish against the nearest hostile character or fire the weapon in a way that would allow it to hit the nearest hostile character.

name: AAF Spool Stabilizer
effect: You may spin up the AAF Spool Stabilizer as a free action; while it is spinning, you can only take actions against a single target this turn and the attached weapon gains +2 to its attack roll.
description: The AAF Spool Stabilizer is a pair of rapidly spinning cylinders whose centrifugal forces lock the rotation of the weapon in place, slowing aiming and making shots be and stay more accurate. The resulting spin is so violent that the cylinders rapidly need replacing after strenuous use.

actions.name: Spin Up Spool Stabilizer
actions.detail: You spin up the AAF Spool Stabilizer until the end of the turn, making it so you can only target one character with actions other than yourself this turn and granting the attached weapon an additional +2 to its attack roll while it is spinning.

synergies.detail: While the AAF Spool Stabilizer is spinning, this weapon gains an additional +2 to its attack roll.

name: Twin Loader
effect: 1/round, when you miss an attack with this weapon, you may re-roll it against a different enemy within range, taking 1 heat while doing so. Attacks re-rolled this way do not deal bonus damage.
